name.description: The name of the artifact source.
The name of the custom image.
The name of the service runner.
The name of the user profile.
The name of the virtual machine.
The name of the virtual network.

ApplicableSchedule.description: Schedules applicable to a virtual machine. The schedules may have been defined on a VM or on lab level.

ApplicableScheduleProperties.description: Properties of a schedules applicable to a virtual machine.

labVmsShutdown.description: The auto-shutdown schedule, if one has been set at the lab or lab resource level.

labVmsStartup.description: The auto-startup schedule, if one has been set at the lab or lab resource level.

ArmTemplateParameterProperties.description: Properties of an Azure Resource Manager template parameter.

name.description: The name of the template parameter.

value.description: The value of the template parameter.

artifactsApplied.description: The total count of the artifacts that were successfully applied.

deploymentStatus.description: The deployment status of the artifact.

totalArtifacts.description: The total count of the artifacts that were tentatively applied.

deploymentStatusMessage.description: The status message from the deployment.

installTime.description: The time that the artifact starts to install on the virtual machine.

vmExtensionStatusMessage.description: The status message from the virtual machine extension.

name.description: The name of the artifact parameter.

value.description: The value of the artifact parameter.

armTemplateFolderPath.description: The folder containing Azure Resource Manager templates.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

securityToken.description: The security token to authenticate to the artifact source.

status.description: Indicates if the artifact source is enabled (values: Enabled, Disabled).

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

BulkCreationParameters.description: Parameters for creating multiple virtual machines as a single action.

instanceCount.description: The number of virtual machine instances to create.

ComputeDataDisk.description: A data disks attached to a virtual machine.

diskSizeGiB.description: Gets data disk size in GiB.

diskUri.description: When backed by a blob, the URI of underlying blob.

managedDiskId.description: When backed by managed disk, this is the ID of the compute disk resource.

ComputeVmInstanceViewStatus.description: Status information about a virtual machine.

displayStatus.description: Gets the short localizable label for the status.

message.description: Gets the message associated with the status.

ComputeVmProperties.description: Properties of a virtual machine returned by the Microsoft.Compute API.

dataDiskIds.description: Gets data disks blob uri for the virtual machine.

dataDisks.description: Gets all data disks attached to the virtual machine.

networkInterfaceId.description: Gets the network interface ID of the virtual machine.

osDiskId.description: Gets OS disk blob uri for the virtual machine.

osType.description: Gets the OS type of the virtual machine.

statuses.description: Gets the statuses of the virtual machine.

vmSize.description: Gets the size of the virtual machine.

CostThresholdProperties.description: Properties of a cost threshold item.

displayOnChart.description: Indicates whether this threshold will be displayed on cost charts.

notificationSent.description: Indicates the datetime when notifications were last sent for this threshold.

percentageThreshold.description: The value of the percentage cost threshold.

sendNotificationWhenExceeded.description: Indicates whether notifications will be sent when this threshold is exceeded.

thresholdId.description: The ID of the cost threshold item.

author.description: The author of the custom image.

description.description: The description of the custom image.

managedImageId.description: The Managed Image Id backing the custom image.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

vhd.description: The VHD from which the image is to be created.

vm.description: The virtual machine from which the image is to be created.

CustomImagePropertiesCustom.description: Properties for creating a custom image from a VHD.

osType.description: The OS type of the custom image (i.e. Windows, Linux)

sysPrep.description: Indicates whether sysprep has been run on the VHD.

CustomImagePropertiesFromVm.description: Properties for creating a custom image from a virtual machine.

linuxOsInfo.description: The Linux OS information of the VM.

windowsOsInfo.description: The Windows OS information of the VM.

time.description: The time of day the schedule will occur.

diskBlobName.description: When backed by a blob, the name of the VHD blob without extension.

diskSizeGiB.description: The size of the disk in Gibibytes.

diskType.description: The storage type for the disk (i.e. Standard, Premium).

diskUri.description: When backed by a blob, the URI of underlying blob.

hostCaching.description: The host caching policy of the disk (i.e. None, ReadOnly, ReadWrite).

leasedByLabVmId.description: The resource ID of the VM to which this disk is leased.

managedDiskId.description: When backed by managed disk, this is the ID of the compute disk resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

armTemplateId.description: The Azure Resource Manager template's identifier.

parameters.description: The parameters of the Azure Resource Manager template.

armTemplateDisplayName.description: The display name of the Azure Resource Manager template that produced the environment.

deploymentProperties.description: The deployment properties of the environment.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

Event.description: An event to be notified for.

eventName.description: The event type for which this notification is enabled (i.e. AutoShutdown, Cost)

ExternalSubnet.description: Subnet information as returned by the Microsoft.Network API.

osType.description: The OS type of the formula.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

vm.description: Information about a VM from which a formula is to be created.

FormulaPropertiesFromVm.description: Information about a VM from which a formula is to be created.

labVmId.description: The identifier of the VM from which a formula is to be created.

GalleryImageReference.description: The reference information for an Azure Marketplace image.

offer.description: The offer of the gallery image.

osType.description: The OS type of the gallery image.

publisher.description: The publisher of the gallery image.

sku.description: The SKU of the gallery image.

version.description: The version of the gallery image.

minute.description: Minutes of the hour the schedule will run.

clientSecretUrl.description: The client secret URL of the identity.

principalId.description: The principal id of resource identity.

InboundNatRule.description: A rule for NAT - exposing a VM's port (backendPort) on the public IP address using a load balancer.

backendPort.description: The port to which the external traffic will be redirected.

frontendPort.description: The external endpoint port of the inbound connection. Possible values range between 1 and 65535, inclusive. If unspecified, a value will be allocated automatically.

transportProtocol.description: The transport protocol for the endpoint.

createdDate.description: The creation date of the cost.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the cost.

endDateTime.description: The end time of the cost data.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

startDateTime.description: The start time of the cost data.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

labStorageType.description: Type of storage used by the lab. It can be either Premium or Standard. Default is Premium.

premiumDataDisks.description:
The setting to enable usage of premium data disks.
When its value is 'Enabled', creation of standard or premium data disks is allowed.
When its value is 'Disabled', only creation of standard data disks is allowed.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

LabVirtualMachineCreationParameter.description: Properties for creating a virtual machine.

location.description: The location of the new virtual machine or environment

name.description: The name of the virtual machine or environment

allowClaim.description: Indicates whether another user can take ownership of the virtual machine

applicableSchedule.description: The applicable schedule for the virtual machine.

artifactDeploymentStatus.description: The artifact deployment status for the virtual machine.

artifacts.description: The artifacts to be installed on the virtual machine.

bulkCreationParameters.description: The number of virtual machine instances to create.

createdByUser.description: The email address of creator of the virtual machine.

createdByUserId.description: The object identifier of the creator of the virtual machine.

createdDate.description: The creation date of the virtual machine.

customImageId.description: The custom image identifier of the virtual machine.

disallowPublicIpAddress.description: Indicates whether the virtual machine is to be created without a public IP address.

environmentId.description: The resource ID of the environment that contains this virtual machine, if any.

fqdn.description: The fully-qualified domain name of the virtual machine.

galleryImageReference.description: The Microsoft Azure Marketplace image reference of the virtual machine.

isAuthenticationWithSshKey.description: Indicates whether this virtual machine uses an SSH key for authentication.

labVirtualNetworkId.description: The lab virtual network identifier of the virtual machine.

notes.description: The notes of the virtual machine.

ownerObjectId.description: The object identifier of the owner of the virtual machine.

ownerUserPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the virtual machine owner.

password.description: The password of the virtual machine administrator.

size.description: The size of the virtual machine.

sshKey.description: The SSH key of the virtual machine administrator.

userName.description: The user name of the virtual machine.

linuxOsState.description: The state of the Linux OS (i.e. NonDeprovisioned, DeprovisionRequested, DeprovisionApplied).

publicIpAddressId.description: The resource ID of the public IP address.

rdpAuthority.description: The RdpAuthority property is a server DNS host name or IP address followed by the service port number for RDP (Remote Desktop Protocol).

sharedPublicIpAddressConfiguration.description: The configuration for sharing a public IP address across multiple virtual machines.

sshAuthority.description: The SshAuthority property is a server DNS host name or IP address followed by the service port number for SSH.

subnetId.description: The resource ID of the sub net.

virtualNetworkId.description: The resource ID of the virtual network.

events.description: The list of event for which this notification is enabled.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

webHookUrl.description: The webhook URL to send notifications to.

status.description: If notifications are enabled for this schedule (i.e. Enabled, Disabled).

timeInMinutes.description: Time in minutes before event at which notification will be sent.

webhookUrl.description: The webhook URL to which the notification will be sent.

PercentageCostThresholdProperties.description: Properties of a percentage cost threshold.

evaluatorType.description: The evaluator type of the policy (i.e. AllowedValuesPolicy, MaxValuePolicy).

factData.description: The fact data of the policy.

factName.description: The fact name of the policy (e.g. LabVmCount, LabVmSize, MaxVmsAllowedPerLab, etc.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

threshold.description: The threshold of the policy (i.e. a number for MaxValuePolicy, and a JSON array of values for AllowedValuesPolicy).

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

backendPort.description: Backend port of the target virtual machine.

dailyRecurrence.description: If the schedule will occur once each day of the week, specify the daily recurrence.

hourlyRecurrence.description: If the schedule will occur multiple times a day, specify the hourly recurrence.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

status.description: The status of the schedule (i.e. Enabled, Disabled)

targetResourceId.description: The resource ID to which the schedule belongs

taskType.description: The task type of the schedule (e.g. LabVmsShutdownTask, LabVmAutoStart).

timeZoneId.description: The time zone ID (e.g. Pacific Standard time).

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

weeklyRecurrence.description: If the schedule will occur only some days of the week, specify the weekly recurrence.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

value.description: The value of the secret for secret creation.

SharedPublicIpAddressConfiguration.description: Properties of a virtual machine that determine how it is connected to a load balancer.

allowPublicIp.description: The permission policy of the subnet for allowing public IP addresses (i.e. Allow, Deny)).

labSubnetName.description: The name of the subnet as seen in the lab.

resourceId.description: The resource ID of the subnet.

SubnetOverride.description: Property overrides on a subnet of a virtual network.

labSubnetName.description: The name given to the subnet within the lab.

resourceId.description: The resource ID of the subnet.

sharedPublicIpAddressConfiguration.description: Properties that virtual machines on this subnet will share.

useInVmCreationPermission.description: Indicates whether this subnet can be used during virtual machine creation (i.e. Allow, Deny).

usePublicIpAddressPermission.description: Indicates whether public IP addresses can be assigned to virtual machines on this subnet (i.e. Allow, Deny).

virtualNetworkPoolName.description: The virtual network pool associated with this subnet.

SubnetSharedPublicIpAddressConfiguration.description: Configuration for public IP address sharing.

allowedPorts.description: Backend ports that virtual machines on this subnet are allowed to expose

UserIdentity.description: Identity attributes of a lab user.

appId.description: Set to the app Id of the client JWT making the request.

objectId.description: Set to the object Id of the client JWT making the request. Not all users have object Id. For CSP (reseller) scenarios for example, object Id is not available.

principalId.description: Set to the principal Id of the client JWT making the request. Service principal will not have the principal Id.

principalName.description: Set to the principal name / UPN of the client JWT making the request.

tenantId.description: Set to the tenant ID of the client JWT making the request.

UserProperties.description: Properties of a lab user profile.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

secretStore.description: The secret store of the user.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

keyVaultId.description: The ID of the user's Key vault.

keyVaultUri.description: The URI of the user's Key vault.

allowedSubnets.description: The allowed subnets of the virtual network.

description.description: The description of the virtual network.

externalProviderResourceId.description: The Microsoft.Network resource identifier of the virtual network.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

subnetOverrides.description: The subnet overrides of the virtual network.

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

time.description: The time of the day the schedule will occur.

weekdays.description: The days of the week for which the schedule is set (e.g. Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, etc.).

windowsOsState.description: The state of the Windows OS (i.e. NonSysprepped, SysprepRequested, SysprepApplied).
